Subject: Vehicle facility from VIP parking area to tarmac and vice-versa of a
in respect of Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha

ris

Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha be provided the facility of
airport vehicle that can ferry him from airport terminal to the aircraft and vice-versa at all
those airports where such a facility exists, for a period of three months w.e-f. 15/03/2014.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA).

(RN'Dhoke, IPS)
‘Adal. Commissioner of Security (CA)

Distribution : As per list atached.

MCA letter No. AV.13024/29/2013-AS dated 16/04/2014.
